txt.en: The Easterlings are hard at work constructing siege machines in the Woodyard near Jóshkhin Orda in the Wold.
The destruction of the Easterlings' siege-weapons will be a great boon to the defence of Floodwend, whose walls would not have withstood such an assault.
The Easterlings are hard at work constructing siege machines in the Woodyard near Jóshkhin Orda in the Wold.
Siege machines are being built in The Woodyard, which is on the eastern side of Jóshkhin Orda.\n\nYou should destroy siege-weapons of the enemy.
The destruction of the Easterlings' siege-weapons will be a great boon to the defence of Floodwend, whose walls would not have withstood such an assault.
